com.paypal.android.sdk.payments

Class PayPalService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • com.paypal.android.sdk.payments.PayPalService

  • public final class PayPalService
extends Service
    Service responsible for communicating with PayPal's servers.

    This service should be started shortly before your code interacts with the service, and stopped when the user is finished. Typically, this will happen in the onCreate() and onDestroy() of your activity, via a call like startService(...) and stopService(...).
